topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1917-1972, Volume VIII, Public Diplomacy, 1969-1972
topic.body: This volume documents the public diplomacy efforts of the Richard M. Nixon administration during his first term in office. A major emphasis of the volume is the role the United States Information Agency (USIA) played in presenting U.S. foreign policy objectives to the world during a time of social change.
topic.image-description: Book Cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1917-1972, Volume VIII, Public Diplomacy, 1969-1972
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
